Improvements.Improvement: Extract anonymous inner classes into separate classes
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- annotations.put(ColumnMeta.class, new ColumnMeta() {
+ annotations.put(ColumnMeta.class, new ColumnMetaImpl())
Improvements.Description: The current implementation uses anonymous inner classes for the `ColumnMeta` and `DimensionFormula` annotations. It would be better to extract these into separate classes for clarity and reusability.

Improvements.Improvement: Use enums instead of String comparisons
Improvements.Description: Instead of comparing the `type` string to 'ENUM_ORDINAL' using `equals`, use an enum and compare using the `fromValue` method.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract TimeGrainDefinition creation into separate method
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- Grain grain = dimension.getGrains().get(idx);
+ Grain grain = getGrain(dimension, idx);
Improvements.Description: Extract the creation of `TimeGrainDefinition` objects from the `for` loop into a separate method for better readability.
